title: What do you think would happen if mana pots replaced hp pots?
body: Right now we completely lost mana pots and only have hp pots but what if it was the other way around? Like if there was no hp pots and only is mana pots sold at 50g and refillable potion only restores mana while the refillable potion upgrades restore way more mana than hp?

replies.body: Champions with built in sustain and mana-hungry poke champs rise in usage and push everyone else out of the scene. Losing mana pots can be fairly easily mitigated. Losing heals pots cannot.
